comments:

The colors allocated by the JFace ColorRegistry are only disposed on the
disposal of the display.  The first instance of the FormsToolkit will 'leak'
because the hyperlink colour is shared by the entire workbench.  The second
instance should causes no further colour allocations.  Can you confirm?

You are correct. This would appear to be expected behaviour. The bug can be 
closed.
